entry.def: Perusal of something such as a letter, article, or document is the action of reading it.

example.ex: Peter Cooke undertook to send each of us a sample contract for perusal...
example.tran: 彼得·库克答应给我们每人寄送一份合同样本供阅读。

example.ex: A perusal of the letters which we have published has satisfied him of the reality of our claim.
example.tran: 读了我们的公开信后，他终于相信我们的要求的确是真的。

means.word_mean: 1. reading carefully with intent to remember
